p: Besides, oligostilbenes also possess antiviral effect. Four stilbenoids, including isorhapontigenin, shegansu B, gnetupendin B and gnetin D from the lianas of Gnetum pendulum (Gnetaceae), exhibited significant in vitro anti-influenza viral activities in MDCK cells with IC 50 values from 0.67 to 11.99 Î¼g/ml, their action mechanism is mainly through influenza neuraminidase (NA) inhibitory effects (see Fig. 3.6; Liu et al. 2010).
